alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 9:25AM PST until January 07 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Northwest to north winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. Local gusts to 55 mph below passes and canyons. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Santa Barbara County South Coast and Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range
